title: Army Aviation helicopter on flood relief operation goes missing: ISPR
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 01 (APP): A Pakistan Army Aviation helicopter, which was on flood relief operation in Lasbela, Balochistan, lost contact with the Air Traffic Control (ATC) on Monday.
Commander 12 Corps  Lt General Sarfraz Ali was on board along with five others, an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) news release said.
It added the search operation for the helicopter was underway and further details would follow.
